NITROalpha

Supercharge. Build. Deploy.

# Introduction

Nitro is a collection of tools, libraries and best practices for building and deploying Serverless backends for your application powered by NestJS and Azure.

  • 😍 Based on the NestJS Framework
  • 🔋 Batteries Included [DB, FileUpload]
  • ⚡️ Deploy as a Serverless app
  • 📈 Automatic scaling
  • 💰 Pay only for what you use

# Links
